templates.template: <news id="${id}" type="0" creator=""> <title> <de>${titleGerman}</de> <en>${titleEnglish}</en> </title> <description> <de>${descriptionGerman}</de> <en>${descriptionEnglish}</en> </description> <effects> </effects> <data genre=${genre} price="1.0" quality="${quality}" /> </news>

<person id="${id}" tmdb_id="0" imdb_id="" creator="" created_by=""> <first_name>${firstName}</first_name> <last_name>${lastName}</last_name> <details job="${job}" gender=${gender} birthday="" deathday="" country=${country} fictional=${fictional} /> <data popularity="${popularity}" affinity="${affinity}" fame="${fame}" scandalizing="0" price_mod="1" power="${power}" humor="${humor}" charisma="${charisma}" appearance="${appearance}" topgenre=${genre} /> </person> ${cursor}

<programme id="${id}" product=${product} licence_type=${licence} creator="" created_by=""> <title> <de>${titleGerman}</de> <en>${titleEnglish}</en> </title> <description> <de>${descriptionGerman}</de> <en>${descriptionEnglish}</en> </description> <staff> <member index="0" function="${job}">${person}</member> </staff> <groups target_groups="0" pro_pressure_groups="0" contra_pressure_groups="0" /> <data country=${country} year="${releaseYear}" distribution=${distribution} maingenre=${genre} subgenre="" flags="${flags}" blocks="${blocks}" price_mod="${priceModifier}" /> <ratings critics="${critics}" speed="${speed}" outcome="${outcome}" /> </programme> ${cursor}

<scripttemplate product=${product} licence_type=${licence} guid="${id}"> <title> <de>${titleGerman}</de> <en>${titleEnglish}</en> </title> <description> <de>${descriptionGerman}</de> <en>${descriptionEnglish}</en> </description> <variables> <${variable}> <de>${contentGerman}</de> <en>${contentEnglish}</en> </${variable}> </variables> <jobs> <job index="0" function="${job1}" required="1" /> <job index="1" function="${job2}" required="1" gender=${gender} /> </jobs> <genres maingenre=${genre} subgenres=${subGenre}/> <potential min="${potentialMin}" max="${potentialMax}" slope="50" /> <outcome min="${outcomeMin}" max="${outcomeMax}" slope="50" /> <review min="${reviewMin}" max="${reviewMax}" slope="50" /> <speed min="${speedMin}" max="${speedMax}" slope="50" /> <price min="${priceMin}" max="${priceMax}" slope="50" /> <blocks min="${blocksMin}" max="${blocksMax}" slope="50" /> <data flags="${flags}" /> </scripttemplate>
